Uses of Package
io.luverolla.gradi.structures

Packages that use io.luverolla.gradi.structures
Package Description
io.luverolla.gradi.comparators  
io.luverolla.gradi.controllers  
io.luverolla.gradi.entities  
io.luverolla.gradi.filters  
io.luverolla.gradi.services  
io.luverolla.gradi.structures  
  • Classes in io.luverolla.gradi.structures used by io.luverolla.gradi.comparators
    Class Description
    CodedEntity
    Generic entity uniquely identified and sorted by a string code This code differs semantically from the ID because it must be mnemonic, since it will be user by users to search for entities
    DatedEntity
    Entity with fields that keep track of creation timestamp and last update timestamp Needed to create generic createdAt and updatedAt filters
  • Classes in io.luverolla.gradi.structures used by io.luverolla.gradi.controllers
    Class Description
    EntitySetRequest
    REST request model to retrieve a set of entities with given sorting and filters In field EntitySetRequest.orders the value string is asc or desc In field EntitySetRequest.filters the value object's actual type depends on filter
  • Classes in io.luverolla.gradi.structures used by io.luverolla.gradi.entities

  • Classes in io.luverolla.gradi.structures used by io.luverolla.gradi.filters

    Filter
    Generic entity filter Can take in account a value to help filtering.
  • Classes in io.luverolla.gradi.structures used by io.luverolla.gradi.services
    Class Description
    EntityService
    Generic service class with essential CRUD and utility methods
    EntitySetRequest
    REST request model to retrieve a set of entities with given sorting and filters In field EntitySetRequest.orders the value string is asc or desc In field EntitySetRequest.filters the value object's actual type depends on filter

  • Classes in io.luverolla.gradi.structures used by io.luverolla.gradi.structures
    Class Description
    ChainedComparator
    Comparator created by combination of other comparators for the same entity type Sorting way is already taken in account by constituting comparators
    ChainedFilter
    Filter created by combination of other filters for same entity type
    CodedEntity
    Generic entity uniquely identified and sorted by a string code This code differs semantically from the ID because it must be mnemonic, since it will be user by users to search for entities

    Entity with fields that keep track of creation timestamp and last update timestamp Needed to create generic createdAt and updatedAt filters
